Package com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps

This package contains all of the classes and resources final project for Java: Discovering It's Power, the online Java programming language course offered by UC Berkeley Extension.
For more information please refer to the project information page
Usage info:
> java com.chuchro.ucbx.java4362.craps

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Bet This abstract class is the super class of all Bet objects; each will extend Bet, or another bet object that extends Bet (ad infinitum)
ComeLineBet A Come Line bet is essentially the same as a Pass Line bet, except for the fact that the Come Line bet is made after the point is rolled.
Craps Main class for the Craps simulator program contained in this package.
Dice This class represents the pair of dice that are used in a craps game.
Die Represents a single die to be used in a craps game.
DontComeBet Don't Come bet for the subsequent rolls of a craps game.
DontOddsBet DontOddsBet is similar to a OddsBet, except that it's attached to a DontPassBet or DontComeBet.
DontOddsBet.DontOddsBetInfo Inner class to hold Don't Odds bet information for all of the different Proposition bet types.
DontPassBet Don't Pass bet for the come out roll of a craps game.
Game This class represents a craps game, absent any of the wagering that a player may make for, against, or about the game.
LineBet This abstract class represents all types of bets that may require multiple rolls to be determined.
LineOddsBet Odds bet for the a pass line bet or a come line bet.
LineOddsBet.LineOddsBetInfo Inner class to hold Line Odds bet information for all of the different Proposition bet types.
OddsBet An OddsBet is attached to any LineBet type and is (optionally) set after the point of the line bet is set.
PassLineBet Pass Line bet for the come out roll of a craps game.
PlaceBet A Place bet is on one of the six field numbers and wins if that number is rolled before a seven (7) is rolled.
PlaceBet.PlaceBetInfo Inner class to hold Place bet information for all of the different Place bet types.
PropositionBet A Proposition bet is on one roll bet that wins only one of the winning point is rolled on the subsequent roll.
PropositionBet.PropositionBetInfo Inner class to hold Proposition bet information for all of the different Proposition bet types.
Session Represents a players session at this virtual craps table.
 

Enum Summary
Bet.BetStatus Enumerates the different states a bet can be in at any given time.
Die.DieNumber Valid values of the six sides of a die, as strings.
Game.GameStatus Enumeration of all of the valid game states/statuses.
PlaceBet.PlaceBetType All valid Place bet types
PropositionBet.PropositionBetType All valid Proposition Bet Types
 

Package com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps Description

This package contains all of the classes and resources final project for Java: Discovering It's Power, the online Java programming language course offered by UC Berkeley Extension.
For more information please refer to the project information page
Usage info:
> java com.chuchro.ucbx.java4362.craps

Author:
Doug Chuchro
